0: This hotel is right by the water at a price that can not be beat
Good food especially the key lime but quite expensive
All in all a reasonable hotel and a decent price
this was a comfortable hotel that is reasonaly priced
I would recommend this hotel price was definitely good for what we got
good rates for a hotel that s offers loads
We booked friends and family rate as we work in BW as well
The room was decent for the price
There is pool bar that sells good food including veggie burgers at a reasonable price
1: That I was not made aware of charges for my fiancés medical supplies being held when I called and they said they could be shipped there no one ever said there was a limit or a fee
I would stay again if the price was right
After realizing that we had have to pay a fortune to park our rental car and pay high room fees we decided to look further out and found the Best Western
Thought about doing the cool speedboat tour but it was pretty pricey
One con is there is no complimentary breakfast as other best western hotels and the buffet breakfast there costs 16 per person
At no point was i advised of the double charge or else i would have remained with the original
I damaged one wall in my room and they fixed it for free without any charges
Price for breakfast does not compare to an iHop though
Service is terrible the food is worse and no matter what they will get theirs as tip is included in the inflated price
